summary:
## ⚙️ Auto-Tune & Performance Lab Polishing

- Auto-Tune logging stays **silent on no-op runs**, only logging real actions or warnings.
- Scheduler/Affinity script now handles **multiple process names** (spaces/commas/semicolons) without parameter errors.
- Power plan detection falls back to `powercfg /list` when `/getactivescheme` fails or is localized, improving
  **Ultimate Performance status accuracy** in the UI.
